EmailTemplate.description: E-check returned No Account/Unable to Locate
EmailTemplate.name: Electronic Check returned No Account/Unable to Locate
EmailTemplate.subject: Electronic Check Returned-Account Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
RE: {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Name}
Our records show that your electronic check in the amount of {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Total_Balance__c} was returned marked No Account/Unable to Locate/Invalid Account.
Since the check which you submitted was not honored, the application which you submitted will not be processed. To obtain your license, you must pay the {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Total_Balance__c} application fee.
You may pay these fees on the eSLA portal at https://eSLA.wi.gov using a credit card by logging in to the portal and accessing your cart in the upper right corner of the screen.
If you wish to mail a certified check or money order send payment to
Dept. of Safety & Professional Services, Attn: Marissa Deen at 608 266-3998
Marissa.Deen@wisconsin.gov
PO Box 8368, Madison, WI 53708-8368.
PLEASE ENCLOSE/SEND A COPY OF THIS EMAIL WITH YOUR PAYMENT IF PAYING BY MAIL.
Fax: 608/261-0346
